metadata.title: CVE-2017-12196 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: undertow before versions 1.4.18.SP1, 2.0.2.Final, 1.4.24.Final was foundvulnerable when using Digest authentication, the server does not ensurethat the value of URI in the Authorization header matches the URI in HTTPrequest line. This allows the attacker to cause a MITM attack and accessthe desired content on the server.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
